<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ArchiveProcessContextAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>ArchiveProcessContextAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var ArchiveProcessContextAjax = Class.create(); ArchiveProcessContextAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { archiveProcessContexts: function() { var contextIds = this.getParameter('sysparm_selectedProcesses'); var processService = new PDProcessService();
processService.archiveProcessContexts(contextIds); }, type: 'ArchiveProcessContextAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-09-11 20:47:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4eb74758a3913110f1f52780f31e6122</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ArchiveProcessContextAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4eb74758a3913110f1f52780f31e6122</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-09-11 21:09:53</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
